text: “Kapena yagumbidwa ine yaikula m’mitima mwenu (yankuiona kuti yakusausya kuwukulidwa, ata n’di yalakweyo chinchiukulidwape).” Pele ni tajile: “Ana wani watachituuchisya (ku umi)?” Jilani: “Ajula juwan’gumbile kandanda.” Pele ni tampukunyichisye mitwe jao ni kuti: “Yele tiichiwa chakachi?” Jilani: “Kuwa-nkuwa pakuwandika!”
